analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sa bcu gcig par brjod ces pa'i bar du'o //

translated: The first stage is called the Joyous because of the joy and bliss of the bodhisattvas who have entered the stage, due to their attainment of the supramundane mind and their realization of the value of the Dharma.

analyzed: sa gnyis pa ni bde ba thams cad skyes pas tshul khrims 'chal ba'i dri ma dang bral ba 'dzin pas na dri ma med ces brjod do //
translated: The second stage is called Immaculate because all happiness is born there and one is free from the stain of immorality.

translated: The third stage is called Shining because one relies on and grasps immeasurable light, and one also holds the concentration of that stage, the learning and reflection of that stage.

original: sa bzhi pa ni nyon mongs pa'i bud shing ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis bsregs par gyur pas ni de'i byang chub kyi chos bsgoms pas na 'od 'phro ba zhes brjod do //üîΩsa lnga pa ni de rnams nyid byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams te /

translated: The fourth stage is called Blazing because one burns the fuel of the afflictions with the light of wisdom, and one cultivates the factors of enlightenment of that stage.

original: de bsgoms pa'i thabs lus nyon mongs par gnas pa de 'dzin par byed pas na sbyang dka' ba zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de bsgoms pa'i thabs lus nyon mongs par gnas pa de 'dzin par byed pas na sbyang dka' ba zhes brjod do //
translated: The fifth stage is called Hard to Conquer because one conquers the afflictions that are difficult to conquer, and one conquers the meditative concentration of the first four stages.üîΩThe sixth stage is called Manifest because one manifests the nonconceptual wisdom that is the antidote to the obscurations to omniscience.üîΩThe seventh stage is called Gone Afar because one has gone far from the obscurations to omniscience.üîΩThe eighth stage is called Immovable because one is not moved by signs or effort.üîΩThe ninth stage is called Excellent Wisdom because one has excellent wisdom in the retention of the Dharma.üîΩThe tenth stage is called Cloud of Dharma because the Dharma of retention is like a cloud that rains down on sentient beings.

original: sa drug pa ni mngon par 'du byed ba la rab tu 'jug pa bsgoms pas mngon sum du byed cing /üîΩphal cher mtshan ma med pa yid la byas pa @208b 'dzin par byed pas ni mngon du byed pa zhes brjod do //üîΩsa bdun pa ni bar chad med cing rgyun ma chad par mtshan ma yid la byed pas ring por 'jug cing rnam par dag pa'i sal rab tu 'jug pa /

translated: The sixth level is called ‚Äúrealized‚Äù because one has cultivated the practice of engaging in manifest effort and has actualized it.

original: 'dzin par byed pas na ring du song zhes brjod do //üîΩsa brgyad pa ni mtshan ma med pa lhun gyis grub pas /
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pas na ring du song zhes brjod do // sa brgyad pa ni mtshan ma med pa lhun gyis grub pas /
translated: The seventh level is called ‚Äúfar reaching‚Äù because one has cultivated the practice of keeping in mind the absence of attributes and has actualized it, and because one has engaged in the practice of keeping in mind the absence of attributes for a long time.

original: mtshan ma dang nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rnams kyis mi g-yo bar 'dzin pas na mi g-yo ba zhes brjod do //
analyzed: mtshan ma dang nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rnams kyis mi g-yo bar 'dzin pas na mi g-yo ba zhes brjod do //
translated: The eighth level is called ‚Äúimmovable‚Äù because one has attained the effortless practice of keeping in mind the absence of attributes and because one keeps in mind the fact that one is unmoved by the hosts of attributes and afflictions.

original: sa dgu pa ni rnam pa thams cad du chos ston pa la gnas shing skyon med pa shin tu rgyas pa thob pa 'dzin pas na legs pa'i blo gros zhes brjod do //
analyzed: sa dgu pa ni rnam pa thams cad du chos ston pa la gnas shing skyon med pa shin tu rgyas pa thob pa 'dzin pas na legs pa'i blo gros zhes brjod do //
translated: The ninth level is called ‚Äúexcellent wisdom‚Äù because one keeps in mind the fact that one has attained the faultless, extensive practice of teaching the Dharma in all its aspects.

original: sa bcu pa ni nam mkha' ltar lus kyi gnas ngan len pa dag la sprin chen po dang / chos kyi mdzod lta bu nas spros shing gsal bar byed pa 'dzin par byed pas na chos kyi sprin zhes brjod do //

translated: The tenth stage is called Cloud of Dharma because it is like the sky, and it holds the great cloud of the bad habits of the body, and it spreads and clarifies the Dharma from the Dharma-treasury.

original: sa bcu gcig pa ni shin tu phra ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rab tu 'joms shing nyon mongs pa 'joms pa la thogs pa med pa rnam pa thams cad du mngon par byang chub pa 'dzin par byed pas na sangs rgyas kun du 'od ces brjod do

translated: The eleventh stage is called Universal Light of the Buddhas because it holds the complete enlightenment of the destruction of the extremely subtle obstacles to the knowledge of the passions, and it is unobstructed in the destruction of the passions.

analyzed: rim pa ni thob par bya ba yin zhing bsgrub par bya ba yin pas na rim pa ste thabs so // rdzogs pa ni lhan @218a * //

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs la ltos nas so //

analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na gsungs pa /

original: gang snyoms par 'jug pa las byung ba'i bde ba skyes pa de dag dman pa'i rgyun dag gis bsdus nas nges pa nyid du 'bring po las gzhan pa'i bde ba dang zhu ba skyes pa'o //

analyzed: bde ba'i ye shes 'phel ba'i bdag nyid can no //

original: de yang dman par gyur pas na dman pa'o //
analyzed: de yang dman par gyur pas na dman pa'o //

analyzed: de yang rtogs pa dang po nyid las so //

original: de yang dpa' bo ste thabs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de yang dpa' bo ste thabs su gyur pa'o //

original: mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The yoginƒ´ of supreme joy.

analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba ni dga' ba dang po la ltos nas so //

analyzed: khyad par du gyur pa'i bde ba'i ye shes mngon du byas pa'o //

original: de yang rnal 'byor ma ste /
analyzed: de yang rnal 'byor ma ste /

original: shes rab bo //üîΩshin tu bde dga' thams cad des //
analyzed: shes rab bo // shin tu bde dga' thams cad des //
translated: It is wisdom.üîΩAll of that is the supreme bliss and joy.

analyzed: zhes pa ni 'dir yid shin tu bde zhing dga' ba ni bde ba ste /

analyzed: bde ba yang de yin la dga' ba yang de yin pas shin tu bde dga'o ;

analyzed: / thams cad dam ma lus pa ni yang dag pa bdun te /

analyzed: gang 'dir dbang po lnga rnams dang yul rnam pa lnga las so //

analyzed: 'di yang mchog tu dga' ba'i pha rol du blta bar bya ste / de lta bu la dga' bral nyid //

original: ces brjod do //
analyzed: ces brjod do //

original: mchog ni zhu ba dang bde ba yang dag par byung ba las mchog tu gyur pa yang ji ltar rdo rje nor bu'i rtsar byang chub kyi sems gnas par gyur pa de nyid nyams su myong ba rtogs pa ni bde ba'i ye shes kyi khyad par ro //

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te /

analyzed: de dag las mchog tu gyur pa dag ste /

analyzed: zhu ba dang bde ba las phung po la sogs pa thams cad do //

analyzed: rig pa ni shes pa ste lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bar ro //

analyzed: mchog tu gyur pa'i bde bar yang dag par gyur pa las so //

analyzed: bzhin du dga' ba rnams zhu ba de'i rkyen las skye bar blta bar bya'o // dga' ba bde ba cung zad bde //
translated: The arising of all bliss is to be seen as arising from the condition of the melting of the joys, as before.üîΩJoy is a little bliss.

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dga' ba ni bde ba cung zad ces pa'i don to //

original: mchog tu dga' ba la ltos pas bde ba chung ba las so //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba la ltos pas bde ba chung ba las so //

original: des na gsungs pa /
analyzed: des na gsungs pa /

analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba de las lhag / ces pa la /

analyzed: dga' bral dga' ba chags bral nyid //

analyzed: ces bya ba ni bral ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams la mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams kyis rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bral ba ste /

original: de rnams su mi 'dzin pas na'o //
analyzed: de rnams su mi 'dzin pas na'o //

original: ma chags pa yang de yin pas chags bral te /
analyzed: ma chags pa yang de yin pas chags bral te /
translated: Since it is free from attachment, it is free from desire.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams la chags pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams la chags pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is free from attachment to objects such as form.

original: chags pa dang bral ba nyid dga' bral te /
analyzed: chags pa dang bral ba nyid dga' bral te /
translated: Free from attachment is free from joy.

original: bdag nyid bde ba cung zad do snyam pa'i nga rgyal tsam du gnas zhes par dgongs so //
analyzed: bdag nyid bde ba cung zad do snyam pa'i nga rgyal tsam du gnas zhes par dgongs so //
translated: It is the mere pride that thinks, ‚ÄúI have a little bliss.‚Äù

original: lhag ma lhan cig skyes dga' nyid //
analyzed: lhag ma lhan cig skyes dga' nyid //
translated: The remainder is connate joy.

original: ces bya ba la lhag ma zhes pa ni lnga pa mi mngon par byas pa ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba la lhag ma zhes pa ni lnga pa mi mngon par byas pa ste /
translated: The remainder is the fifth, which is not manifest.

original: dga' bral gyi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: dga' bral gyi lhag ma'o //
translated: It is the remainder of free from joy.

original: des na tshogs pa'i lhag ma thob pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba yin pas dga' bral gyi tshogs pa'i lhag mar gyur pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ste /
analyzed: des na tshogs pa'i lhag ma thob pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba yin pas dga' bral gyi tshogs pa'i lhag mar gyur pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ste /
translated: Therefore, the remainder of the assembly is connate joy. Since it is the remainder of the assembly of free from joy, it is connate joy.

original: nor bu'i dkyil gyi tshogs pa las thob pa'o //
analyzed: nor bu'i dkyil gyi tshogs pa las thob pa'o //
translated: It is obtained from the assembly of the jewel.

original: lhag ma zhes pa ni mchog dga' dang / dga' bral du yang sbyar ro //
analyzed: lhag ma zhes pa ni mchog dga' dang / dga' bral du yang sbyar ro //
translated: The remainder is also to be applied to the supreme joy and the joy of separation.

original: ni'i sgra yang khyad par nyid du ston pa'i don to //üîΩsnyoms par 'jug pa tsam las byung ba'i zhu ba de'i lhag mar gyur pa ni dga' ba ste /
analyzed: ni'i sgra yang khyad par nyid du ston pa'i don to // snyoms par 'jug pa tsam las byung ba'i zhu ba de'i lhag mar gyur pa ni dga' ba ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù indicates the distinction.

analyzed: rdo rje rtsa ba'i tshogs pa las rnyed pa'o // dga' ba'i tshogs pa'i lhag mar gyur pa ni mchog dga' ste /
translated: The joy that is the remainder of that melting that arises from mere meditative concentration is obtained from the assembly of the vajra root.

original: rdo rje dkyil gyi tshogs pa las rnyed pa'o //üîΩmchog dga'i tshogs pa'i lhag mar gyur pa ni dga' bral te /
analyzed: rdo rje dkyil gyi tshogs pa las rnyed pa'o // mchog dga'i tshogs pa'i lhag mar gyur pa ni dga' bral te /
translated: The supreme joy that is the remainder of the assembly of joy is obtained from the assembly of the vajra center.

original: rdo rje nor bu'i @219b rtsa ba'i tshogs pa las thob pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu'i @219b rtsa ba'i tshogs pa las thob pa zhes pa'o //
translated: The joy of separation that is the remainder of the assembly of supreme joy is obtained from the assembly of the vajra jewel root.

original: la la dag 'dod pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: la la dag 'dod pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: Some assert the following:

original: bgrang ba tsam gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba lhag ma nyid du rtogs pa ni byang chub kyi sems ltung ba nyid la dga' bral du byas nas /
analyzed: bgrang ba tsam gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba lhag ma nyid du rtogs pa ni byang chub kyi sems ltung ba nyid la dga' bral du byas nas /
translated: The realization of the innate joy as the remainder by mere counting is the joy of the bodhicitta falling.

analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dga' bral gyis sngon du khyer bar byed do //

analyzed: de ni bden pa ma yin te / bsgrub bya grub pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: That is not true.üîΩBecause the probandum is established.

original: gang gi phyir lhan cig skyes pa ni rkyen gyis bsgrubs pas so //üîΩde yang dngos su 'am /
analyzed: gang gi phyir lhan cig skyes pa ni rkyen gyis bsgrubs pas so // de yang dngos su 'am /
translated: Because the innate is established by conditions.üîΩAnd that is either directly

original: brgyud nas te /
analyzed: brgyud nas te /
translated: or indirectly.

original: dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' bas shes par byed do zhe na /
analyzed: dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' bas shes par byed do zhe na /
translated: It is known by the bliss and supreme bliss.

analyzed: 'o na dga' bral gyi rjes su 'brangs pas ci zhig bya ste /

analyzed: gang gi phyir dngos po rtogs nas bzung ba yin gyi /
translated: Because things are apprehended after they are cognized.

original: tha mal pas kyang dngos po'i rang bzhin mi rtogs shing go ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: tha mal pas kyang dngos po'i rang bzhin mi rtogs shing go ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: Ordinary people do not cognize and understand the nature of things.

original: dngos po yang bsgom par byas nas grol ba thob pa yin gyis /
analyzed: dngos po yang bsgom par byas nas grol ba thob pa yin gyis /
translated: And it is after meditating on things that one attains liberation.

original: de yang de ltar ma bsgoms na rang bzhin dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang de ltar ma bsgoms na rang bzhin dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, if one does not meditate in that way, the nature will not be perceived.

original: rang bzhin mthong ba las ni dngos po rnams mthong ba ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin mthong ba las ni dngos po rnams mthong ba ste /
translated: And it is after seeing things that one sees their nature.

original: rang bzhin ni grol ba nyid yin pas so //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni grol ba nyid yin pas so //
translated: Because seeing the nature is itself liberation.

original: de yang 'chad par 'gyur te //
analyzed: de yang 'chad par 'gyur te //
translated: And that will be explained.

original: rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa nyid //
analyzed: rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa nyid //
translated: The nature is itself nirvana.

original: ces pa'o // lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin yang gzung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ces pa'o // lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin yang gzung ba ma yin te /
translated: The connate nature is also not apprehended.

original: gzung @223a * //
analyzed: gzung @223a * //
translated: The object of apprehension.üîΩüîΩ

original: ba la sogs pa'i mngon par zhen pas so //
analyzed: ba la sogs pa'i mngon par zhen pas so //
translated: By the attachment to the apprehended, etc.

original: des na gsungs pa /
analyzed: des na gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: rang rig las ni 'grub par 'gyur //üîΩzhes pa la /
analyzed: rang rig las ni 'grub par 'gyur // zhes pa la /
translated: It is accomplished from self-awareness.

original: rang rig ni de'i bde ba chen po rang yang dag par rig pas so //
analyzed: rang rig ni de'i bde ba chen po rang yang dag par rig pas so //
translated: Self-awareness is the awareness of one's own great bliss.

original: des na phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub po //
analyzed: des na phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub po //
translated: Therefore, it is the power of the great seal.

original: rtogs pa tsam gyis kyang ji ltar dngos grub tu 'gyur zhe na /üîΩgsungs pa / rang rig phyir na bsgoms pa nyid //
analyzed: rtogs pa tsam gyis kyang ji ltar dngos grub tu 'gyur zhe na / gsungs pa / rang rig phyir na bsgoms pa nyid //
translated: If it is asked how there is power through mere realization,

original: ces pa ste /
analyzed: ces pa ste /
translated: it is said:üîΩBecause of self-awareness, it is meditation itself.

original: rang rig pa nyid bsgoms pa las ma gtogs pa'i dngos grub ni yod pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: rang rig pa nyid bsgoms pa las ma gtogs pa'i dngos grub ni yod pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: Power does not exist apart from the meditation of self-awareness.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin lha rnams kyi dngos por bsgom pas grol bar ster bar 'gyur zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin lha rnams kyi dngos por bsgom pas grol bar ster bar 'gyur zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: It is the intention that meditation on the nature of the connate deities grants liberation.

original: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rnams lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin no zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rnams lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin no zhes gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that virtuous and nonvirtuous actions are the nature of the connate.

original: rang rig pa'i rang bzhin las zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rang rig pa'i rang bzhin las zhes pa'o //
translated: It is said, ‚Äúfrom the nature of self-awareness.‚Äù

original: de lta mod kyi grol bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi grol bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But how can there be liberation in that way?üîΩIt is said:

original: gsungs pa / gnod pa las ni las skyes te //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gsungs pa / gnod pa las ni las skyes te // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Karma arises from harm.

original: gnod pa ni rnam par rtog pa ste /
analyzed: gnod pa ni rnam par rtog pa ste /
translated: Harm is discursive thought,

original: mngon par zhen pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: which means clinging.

original: de yang lhan cig skyes pa ni shes bya'i sgrib pas bsgribs te ma mthong bas lhan cig skyes pa nyid las las kyi snang ba skye bar byed de /
analyzed: de yang lhan cig skyes pa ni shes bya'i sgrib pas bsgribs te ma mthong bas lhan cig skyes pa nyid las las kyi snang ba skye bar byed de /
translated: Moreover, the connate [nature] is obscured by the obscuration of knowledge. Since it is not seen, the appearance of karma arises from the connate [nature] itself.

original: ji ltar rab rib can lta bur dag pa'i rang bzhin nam mkha'i ngos su bden pa ma yin pa las skra shad kyi phung po rnams so //üîΩgang gis 'phrog cing zhes bya ba ni rang nyid las dang nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //üîΩrang gis byed ces pa ni las dang nyon mongs par yang byed pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar rab rib can lta bur dag pa'i rang bzhin nam mkha'i ngos su bden pa ma yin pa las skra shad kyi phung po rnams so // gang gis 'phrog cing zhes bya ba ni rang nyid las dang nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o // rang gis byed ces pa ni las dang nyon mongs par yang byed pa ste /
translated: Just as those with eye disease see strands of hair in the sky, which is the pure nature, and unreal aggregates,üîΩThe one who steals is the connate joy that conquers karma and afflictions.üîΩThe one who acts is karma and afflictions.

original: rang nyid kyis grol ba dang 'khor ba byed ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: rang nyid kyis grol ba dang 'khor ba byed ces pa'i don to //
translated: The one who is liberated is the connate joy that conquers karma and afflictions.

original: rang nyid rgyal po zhes pa ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das par mngon par zhen pa med pa'i rang bzhin mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa ni rang nyid do //
analyzed: rang nyid rgyal po zhes pa ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das par mngon par zhen pa med pa'i rang bzhin mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa ni rang nyid do //
translated: One's own king means that one's own nature, which is the non-abiding nirvana that is free from the manifest clinging to cyclic existence and nirvana, is the king.

original: rang nyid gtso bo zhes pa ni bdag nyid la bdag nyid kyis khyab pa'o //
analyzed: rang nyid gtso bo zhes pa ni bdag nyid la bdag nyid kyis khyab pa'o //
translated: One's own chief means that one's own nature pervades one's own nature.

original: yang na rang nyid las dkyil 'khor sprul pa dang / rang nyid gzung ba la sogs pa de dag nyid du mngon par zhen pa 'joms pa dang / rang nyid dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid kyis na rgyal po ste /
analyzed: yang na rang nyid las dkyil 'khor sprul pa dang / rang nyid gzung ba la sogs pa de dag nyid du mngon par zhen pa 'joms pa dang / rang nyid dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid kyis na rgyal po ste /
translated: Alternatively, one's own king means that one's own nature is the king because one's own nature emanates the mandala, one's own nature conquers the clinging to those very things such as the apprehended, and one's own nature is the lord of the mandala.

original: rang nyid brtan pa dang g-yo ba la khyab ces pa'o //
analyzed: rang nyid brtan pa dang g-yo ba la khyab ces pa'o //
translated: One's own nature pervades the animate and inanimate.

original: da ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa las grol ba nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa las grol ba nyid gsungs pa /
translated: Now he states the freedom from the afflictive obstructions.

original: 'dod chags zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'dod chags zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Attachment, etc.

original: 'dod @223b chags ni 'khor ba'i bya ba'i dgos pa la chags pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod @223b chags ni 'khor ba'i bya ba'i dgos pa la chags pa'o //
translated: Attachment is the attachment to the purpose of the activity of cyclic existence.

original: zhe sdang ni sems kun nas mnar sems pa'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang ni sems kun nas mnar sems pa'o //
translated: Hatred is the complete mental anguish.

original: phrag dog ni gzhan gyi yon tan la mi bzod pa'o //
analyzed: phrag dog ni gzhan gyi yon tan la mi bzod pa'o //
translated: Jealousy is the inability to bear another's good qualities.

original: gti mug ni shes bya'i sgrib pa ste /
analyzed: gti mug ni shes bya'i sgrib pa ste /
translated: Delusion is the obscuration of the knowable.

original: de yang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la sogs pa la rtag pa dang bdag nyid la sogs par shes pa'i rang bzhin no //üîΩnga rgyal ni sems khengs pa gang gi phyir 'di ltar phung po lnga rnams la bdag nyid du bkod pa yang nga 'am bdag go zhes khyad par de dang de'i bdag nyid du khengs pa ste /
analyzed: de yang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la sogs pa la rtag pa dang bdag nyid la sogs par shes pa'i rang bzhin no // nga rgyal ni sems khengs pa gang gi phyir 'di ltar phung po lnga rnams la bdag nyid du bkod pa yang nga 'am bdag go zhes khyad par de dang de'i bdag nyid du khengs pa ste /
translated: It is the nature of the mind to perceive the five appropriated aggregates as permanent, as a self, etc.üîΩPride is the inflation of the mind. It is the inflation of the mind that occurs when one thinks, I am, in reference to the five aggregates.

original: gang gi phyir 'di ltar phung po lnga rnams la bdag nyid du bkod pa yang nga 'am bdag go zhes khyad par de dang de'i bdag nyid du khengs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di ltar phung po lnga rnams la bdag nyid du bkod pa yang nga 'am bdag go zhes khyad par de dang de'i bdag nyid du khengs par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the inflation of the mind that occurs when one thinks, I am, in reference to the five aggregates.

original: de yang rnam pa bdun du phyed pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa bdun du phyed pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: It is divided into seven types:

original: nga rgyal ni shes pa dang / rigs dang nor la sogs pa rnams kyis dman pa las rigs la sogs pa mtho'o snyam pa'o //
analyzed: nga rgyal ni shes pa dang / rigs dang nor la sogs pa rnams kyis dman pa las rigs la sogs pa mtho'o snyam pa'o //
translated: Pride is the inflation of the mind that occurs when one thinks, I am superior or I am equal in relation to an inferior or an equal, respectively, with regard to the social class to which one belongs, one's family, one's wisdom, one's morality, one's faith, one's asceticism, or one's possessions.

original: lhag pa'i nga rgyal ni rigs dang / shes pa dang / nor la sogs pa mtshungs pa las gtong ba dang / tshul khrims dang / skyes bu la sogs pas bzang ngo snyam pa'o //
analyzed: lhag pa'i nga rgyal ni rigs dang / shes pa dang / nor la sogs pa mtshungs pa las gtong ba dang / tshul khrims dang / skyes bu la sogs pas bzang ngo snyam pa'o //
translated: Exaggerated pride is the thought I am superior in relation to those who are equal to oneself in terms of family, knowledge, wealth, etc.üîΩPride of pride is the thought I am superior in relation to those who are superior to oneself in terms of family, knowledge, wealth, etc.

original: nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal ni rigs dang / shes pa dang / nor la sogs pas bzang ba las /üîΩrigs dang / shes pa dang / nor la sogs pa bzang ngo //
analyzed: nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal ni rigs dang / shes pa dang / nor la sogs pas bzang ba las / rigs dang / shes pa dang / nor la sogs pa bzang ngo //
translated: The thought I am superior in relation to those who are equal to oneself in terms of family, knowledge, wealth, etc.

original: nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal ni nye bar len pa'i phung po rnams bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba la bdag gir sems mngon par zhen cing khengs pa'o //
analyzed: nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal ni nye bar len pa'i phung po rnams bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba la bdag gir sems mngon par zhen cing khengs pa'o //
translated: The pride of thinking I am is the inflation of the mind that is attached to the thought of mine in relation to the appropriated aggregates, which are devoid of a self and what belongs to a self.

original: mngon pa'i nga rgyal ni gong ma'i khyad par ma thob par bdag gis mngon sum nyid du thob pa'o zhes sems khengs pa'o //üîΩcung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal ni /
analyzed: mngon pa'i nga rgyal ni gong ma'i khyad par ma thob par bdag gis mngon sum nyid du thob pa'o zhes sems khengs pa'o //üîΩcung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal ni /
translated: Arrogance is the inflation of the mind that thinks I have attained in relation to a special attainment that one has not yet attained.üîΩThe pride of thinking I am is the inflation of the mind that thinks I am in relation to the five aggregates of attachment.

original: shes pa dang / rigs dang / nor la sogs pa khyad par shin tu 'phags pa la rigs dang / shes pa dang / nor la sogs pa cung zad kyis dman snyam pa'o //
analyzed: shes pa dang / rigs dang / nor la sogs pa khyad par shin tu 'phags pa la rigs dang / shes pa dang / nor la sogs pa cung zad kyis dman snyam pa'o //
translated: Pride of inferiority is the thought that one is slightly inferior to those who are very much superior in knowledge, lineage, wealth, and so on.

original: log pa'i nga rgyal ni yon tan ma yin pa la yon tan can no snyam du sems khengs pa'o //üîΩde lta bu'i 'dod chags pa'i nyon mongs pas de gnas la /
analyzed: log pa'i nga rgyal ni yon tan ma yin pa la yon tan can no snyam du sems khengs pa'o // de lta bu'i 'dod chags pa'i nyon mongs pas de gnas la /
translated: Wrong pride is the inflation of the mind that thinks, I am superior, when one is not superior in terms of good qualities.

original: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //üîΩzhes bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: bcu drug char yang mi phod do // zhes bya bar 'brel to //
translated: One who is in that way inflated by pride does not approach the bodhisattva.

original: de'i sgra ni lhan cig skyes pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i sgra ni lhan cig skyes pa nyid do //
translated: The word approach is a synonym for to attain.

original: gnas ni ye shes te /
analyzed: gnas ni ye shes te /
translated: The state is gnosis.

original: 'dis nyon mongs pa zad nas go 'phang du bgrod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis nyon mongs pa zad nas go 'phang du bgrod pa'o //
translated: It is a state because one is brought to that state by the exhaustion of afflictions.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of peace.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of bliss.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of permanence.

original: de nyid go 'phang yang yin gnas kyang yin pa ste /üîΩlhan @224a * //
analyzed: de nyid go 'phang yang yin gnas kyang yin pa ste / lhan @224a * //
translated: It is a state because it is a state of self.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of purity.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of beauty.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of joy.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of freedom from sorrow.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of non-distress.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of non-confusion.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of non-violence.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of non-duality.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of non-differentiation.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of non-conceptualization.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of non-apprehension.

original: cig skyes pa'i ye shes zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: cig skyes pa'i ye shes zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It is a state because it is a state of non-perception.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of non-discrimination.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of non-grasping.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of non-rejection.

original: nyams dga' zhes pa yang dpes bskrun du med pa nyid las so //
analyzed: nyams dga' zhes pa yang dpes bskrun du med pa nyid las so //
translated: It is a state because it is a state of non-attachment.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of non-conceiving.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state of non-arising.üîΩ It is a state because it is a state

original: lhan cig skyes pa dang ldan pa de la ni bcu drug gi chas sbyar ba ma yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa dang ldan pa de la ni bcu drug gi chas sbyar ba ma yin no //
translated: He who is endowed with the connate is not associated with the sixteen parts.

original: gang gi phyir zla ba ni bcu drug gis dus te de'i yang cha ni bcu drug yin pas /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zla ba ni bcu drug gis dus te de'i yang cha ni bcu drug yin pas /
translated: Because the moon is the time of the sixteen, and its parts are sixteen.

original: bcu drug char yang ngo //
analyzed: bcu drug char yang ngo //
translated: The sixteen parts are also.

original: de yang don gyis bya ba mi byed pa des na yang nyon mongs pa de dag mi gnas so zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de yang don gyis bya ba mi byed pa des na yang nyon mongs pa de dag mi gnas so zhes pa'i don to //
translated: And because that does not perform the function of the object, the afflictions do not abide.

original: don byed pa'i nus pa'i cha yang yod pa ma yin no zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: don byed pa'i nus pa'i cha yang yod pa ma yin no zhes dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that the aspect of the ability to perform the function does not exist.

original: chos 'byung las skyes ye shes zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: chos 'byung las skyes ye shes zhes bya ba la /
translated: The wisdom born from the source of phenomena

original: chos ni gnyug ma ste dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: chos ni gnyug ma ste dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Dharma is the intrinsic nature, the nature of all things.

original: de yang gcig dang du ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: de yang gcig dang du ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o //
translated: Moreover, it is free from the nature of one and many, and so on.

original: las skyes ni de las byung ba ste /
analyzed: las skyes ni de las byung ba ste /
translated: Born from the source is arisen from that.

original: chos 'byung las skyes so //
analyzed: chos 'byung las skyes so //
translated: It is born from the source of phenomena.

original: chos 'byung gi gnas 'di yis bskyed pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: chos 'byung gi gnas 'di yis bskyed pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: The wisdom of emptiness generated by this source of phenomena.

original: des na skyes pa zhes pa ni de nyid du'o ;
analyzed: des na skyes pa zhes pa ni de nyid du'o ;
translated: Therefore, born means in that very place.

original: / ye shes ni rab tu gsal ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyis so //
analyzed: / ye shes ni rab tu gsal ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyis so //
translated: Knowledge is the nature of clear light.

original: mkha' mnyam ni gnyug mar grub pa las so //
analyzed: mkha' mnyam ni gnyug mar grub pa las so //
translated: Space-like is from the innate.

original: de ji lta bu'i ye shes yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ji lta bu'i ye shes yin zhe na /
translated: What kind of knowledge is that?üîΩIt is said:

original: gsungs pa / lhan cig thabs dang bcas zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / lhan cig thabs dang bcas zhes pa ste /
translated: Together with the method.

original: thabs dang bcas pas 'phel bas na thabs dang bcas pa ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: thabs dang bcas pas 'phel bas na thabs dang bcas pa ni shes rab bo //
translated: The method is the increase of wisdom.

original: de dang lhan cig pa ni der rab tu bsgrub pa ste /
analyzed: de dang lhan cig pa ni der rab tu bsgrub pa ste /
translated: Together with that is the accomplishment in that,

original: de las ma gtogs pas shes pa'i nus pa med ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: de las ma gtogs pas shes pa'i nus pa med ces pa'i don to //
translated: because there is no capacity for knowledge apart from that.

original: 'jig rten gsum po de las skyes //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po de las skyes //
translated: The three worlds are born from that.

original: zhes pa 'dis ni shes rab kyi chos 'byung gi nang gi dkyil 'khor du sems can rnams dbang bskur bas bde ba chen po thob pa dang / de las skyes pa zhes rtogs par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis ni shes rab kyi chos 'byung gi nang gi dkyil 'khor du sems can rnams dbang bskur bas bde ba chen po thob pa dang / de las skyes pa zhes rtogs par bya ba'i don to //
translated: This shows that sentient beings attain great bliss by initiation in the mandala in the Dharma source of wisdom, and that they are born from that.

original: yang na 'jig rten gsum ni sprul pa la sogs pa'i sku gsum mo //
analyzed: yang na 'jig rten gsum ni sprul pa la sogs pa'i sku gsum mo //
translated: Or else, the three worlds are the three bodies, emanation and so forth.

original: de la lhan cig skyes pa las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor goms pa nyid ni 'dod par 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de la lhan cig skyes pa las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor goms pa nyid ni 'dod par 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba'o //
translated: The practice of the mandala that arises from the innate is the desired union.

original: de nyid kyis na nyid kyi sgra ni nges par gzung ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na nyid kyi sgra ni nges par gzung ba'o //
translated: The word just is for the purpose of restriction.

original: de nyid ci zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid ci zhe na /
translated: What is that?üîΩIt is said:

original: gsungs pa / shes rab ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / shes rab ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Wisdom and so forth.

original: shes rab ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: shes rab ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Wisdom is innate pristine consciousness.

original: thabs zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: thabs zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: Method is the mandala circle.

original: rang bzhin ni de dag tu nges pa ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin ni de dag tu nges pa ste /
translated: Nature is ascertained in those.

original: ldog pas byas pa'i tha dad tsam //üîΩ@224b zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ldog pas byas pa'i tha dad tsam // @224b zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It is just a difference made by exclusion.üîΩThis is the meaning.

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: lhan cig skyes pa rtogs pa las lha'i rnam pa bsgoms pas sku gsum 'grub ces pa'am /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa rtogs pa las lha'i rnam pa bsgoms pas sku gsum 'grub ces pa'am /
